scripts.migration:create: pnpm run build && npx typeorm migration:create
scripts.migration:generate: pnpm run build && npx typeorm migration:generate -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run: pnpm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d dist/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: pnpm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d dist/db/data-source.js
